revised_title: Investigations into Organo-Metallic Compounds: Formation and Properties of Stanic Ethide and Mercuric Ethylomethide
tldr: The author investigates the formation and properties of organometallic compounds, specifically stannic ethide and mercuric ethylomethide, through a series of reactions and experiments. The findings contribute to the understanding of the behavior and potential applications of these compounds in various chemical processes.
